column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I had to bake a cake for a birthday party .
#text=I took out the ingredients and put them on the counter : flour , sugar , eggs , vanilla , salt , baking soda , and milk .
#text=I then turned on the oven , setting it at 375 degrees .
#text=While it was preheating , I got to work .
#text=I mixed the wet ingredients together in a big bowl , and then slowly started adding the dry ingredients .
#text=I used a blender to stir the ingredients together .
#text=When they were all mixed together , the batter was ready .
#text=It was the consistence of thick maple syrup .
#text=I sprayed spray oil on the inside of a pan and then poured the cake batter into the pan .
#text=When the oven beeped to let me know that it was finished preheating , I put the pan into the oven .
#text=I put on a timer for 12 minutes .
#text=When the timer went off , I opened the oven door and took the pan out .
#text=I inserted a toothpick into the center of the cake and took it out to see if the cake was done : the toothpick came out without any batter attached to it , so the cake was good to go .
#text=I turned off the oven and left the cake in the pan on the counter to cool .
#text=After a while I moved the cake to a cooling rack .
#text=When it was completely cool I covered it with chocolate frosting and wrote '' `` Happy Birthday ! '' ''
#text=on the top with a tube of blue icing .
